links: W. Lang, On generalizations of Stirling number triangles, J. Integer Seqs., Vol. 3 (2000), #00.2.4.
formula: E.g.f. exp(1-(1-5*x)^(1/5))-1.a(n) = D^n(exp(x)) evaluated at x = 0, where D is the operator 1/(1-x)^4*d/dx. Cf. A001515, A015735 and A016036. - Peter Bala, Nov 25 2011
author: _Wolfdieter Lang_
